name: High Message count for {{queuename.name}} SQS queue - DD Example
message:
{{queuename.name}} SQS queue  - Messages are above {{threshold}}.

See in [SQS Dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/screen/integration/6/aws-sqs?tpl_var_scope=queuename%3A{{queuename.name}}) 
Please investigate - see in [AWS console](https://console.aws.amazon.com/sqs/home?region={{region.name}}#)
